summary: Email chain from October 2020 discussing privilege review of materials from a search warrant database related to Jeffrey Epstein. The emails focus on identifying potentially privileged communications involving Epstein's attorneys and private investigators, including Roy Black and Jack Goldberger.

persons.name: Roy Black
persons.context: Mentioned as a private investigator hired by Epstein in connection with criminal investigation and civil litigation in Florida.

persons.name: Jack Goldberger
persons.context: Identified as an attorney who represented Epstein; his email address was flagged for privilege review in the search warrant database.

connections.description: Epstein hired private investigator Roy Black in connection with criminal investigation and civil litigation in Florida.
Jack Goldberger is identified as an attorney who represented Epstein.

events.title: Privilege Review Coordination
events.description: Email exchange regarding privilege review of Epstein search warrant database materials, focusing on communications from private investigators and attorneys.

keyFacts: Epstein hired private investigators, including Roy Black, in connection with criminal investigation and civil litigation in Florida.
Attorney Jack Goldberger represented Epstein, and his email communications were flagged for privilege review in the search warrant database.
The email chain from October 2020 shows ongoing legal review of Epstein-related materials posthumously, focusing on identifying privileged attorney-client communications.
